title: REVO Skype tool and bot
description:
This was an interesting find i saw on HF so i figured I'd share with my fellow pirates.

Details about the program:

What's REVO?

REVO is a simple but very usefull skype-multitool with many functions. It very easy to use and does include many powerfull and usefull features. You can send broadcast messages, use our AFK-Bot, Fake Quotes, Steal Accounts and much more!

What features does it have?

[ ✔ ] Spambot
Send hundreds of messages in just a few seconds.
[ ✔ ] Broadcast
Send a message to all your contacts at once.
[ ✔ ] Statusbot
Change your online status very fast and annoy your friends.
[ ✔ ] Callbot
Calls a particular person repeatedly.
[ ✔ ] Auto Reply
Send an predefined response or let an artificial intelligence reply for you.
[ ✔ ] Quote Faker
Simply fake skype-quotes by entering a username and a timestamp.
[ ✔ ] Account Stealer
Copy your friends skype account, including profile picture, mood and name.
[ ✔ ] Logs
Logs all received messages, in case of someone removes a them.
[ ✔ ] Random Mood
Generates a random mood.
[ ✔ ] Status [NEW!]
Send a status as a text message!
[ ✔ ] Inverted [NEW!]
Send a crazy inverted test message!
[ ✔ ] Animation [NEW!]
Add an annoying loading animation to your messages!
[ ✔ ] Anti Copy [NEW!]
Makes copying your messages really annoying!
[ ✔ ] Crasher [NEW!]
Crashes your friends skype client!
[ ✔ ] Last Online
Shows when a user was the last time online.
[ ✔ ] Auto Friend Accept
Automatically accepts friend requests.
[ ✔ ] Mood Spinner [NEW!]
Use a spinning animation in your mood to confuse your friends.
[ ✔ ] Blinking Mood [NEW!]
Add a blinking animation to your mood.

Enjoy :)
